title: WHY THE F*** AM I BANNED
body:
This account has been suspended until 12 October, 2016. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details.
why exactly is my account banned? i haven't received any emails what so ever? If its because i afked 1 game as leesin jungle, its because your stupid lol patcher was framing me into the f***ing ground!

replies.body:
It sounds like you get very salty. I imagine it may have something to do with that..
{{summoner:14}}

Hey there,

If you're unable to find the email regarding your ban then you'll have to [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for further information regarding your suspension.
Hello riot why am I banned??? Please explain !!!!
